name: @taqueria/tests
description: This is Taqueria testing project includes unit, integration and e2e tests

scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:deno && npm run test:unit:jest
scripts.test:unit:deno:with-coverage: TEST=true deno test unit/ --allow-all --unstable --coverage=coverage_report && deno coverage coverage_report && deno coverage coverage_report --lcov > coverage_profile.lcov
scripts.test:unit:selected: TEST=true deno test unit/taqueria-utils/taqueria-utils.test.ts --allow-all --unstable --coverage=coverage_report && deno coverage coverage_report

author: Jev Bjorsell
